Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy and Breitbart’s National Security Editor Frances Martel will update us on the situation in North Korea as the regime claims it has successfully tested its first intercontinental ballistic missile.

On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Editor-in-Chief Alex Marlow will continue our discussion of the Trump administration’s agenda.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Breitbart Business and Finance Editor John Carney will analyze the merits of White House Chief Strategist Steve Bannon’s populist tax hike proposal.
Dan Gainor of the Media Research Center will discuss the media’s continued freak out over Trump’s Tweet about CNN and MSNBC’s Morning Joe.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
We’ll also have a special hour-long discussion with Milo Yiannopoulos about the release of his new book Dangerous.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
